comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: The line is for the ride "Helter Skelter", which was slick bamboo. Suggestified using this map.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 13, 2011, Rob Ketcherside suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 9385421@N08
comment._content: Great looking picture. I got a post card of the the Helter Skelter slide

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: I just noticed that the "line" looks like a conveyor belt carrying patrons to the top of the ride.

comment.author: 9385421@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tigerzombie] Correct. I can't recall if this one did it, but some of the old slides would deposit the rider right into the slides trough and down you went. It looks like shoes are being worn by the riders.
